mapper.select: WITH first_join AS ( SELECT du.room_no, MIN(du2.member_no) as member_no FROM dm_user du INNER JOIN dm_user du2 ON du.room_no = du2.room_no AND du.member_no != du2.member_no WHERE du.member_no = #{memberNo} GROUP BY du.room_no ) SELECT dr.room_name, drr.member_no, drr.room_rename, dr.room_type, dr.room_no, dm.message_no, dm.message_content, dm.message_sender, dm.message_send_time, dm.message_type, m.member_nick, m.member_name, mp.attachment_no FROM first_join f INNER JOIN dm_user du ON f.room_no = du.room_no AND f.member_no = du.member_no LEFT JOIN dm_room dr ON du.room_no = dr.room_no LEFT JOIN dm_room_rename drr ON dr.room_no = drr.room_no and drr.member_no= #{memberNo} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_no, MAX(message_no) AS last_message_no FROM dm_message GROUP BY room_no ) lm ON du.room_no = lm.room_no LEFT JOIN dm_message dm ON lm.last_message_no = dm.message_no INNER JOIN member m ON du.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN member_profile mp ON du.member_no = mp.member_no WHERE m.member_no NOT IN (SELECT block_no FROM block WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}) ORDER BY dm.message_no DESC
